long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use this extension to easily visualize whether you have met your program requirements. Once you type your courses into the input box, the relevant courses in the undergrad calendar will be highlighted green. You can manually remove duplicates by unchecking the checkboxes.

This checklist works on both the new UWaterloo Undergrad Calendar https://uwaterloo.ca/academic-calendar/undergraduate-studies/catalog#/home
and the old UWaterloo Undergrad Calendars
https://uwaterloo.ca/academic-calendar/archives

GitHub: https://github.com/pl3lee/ugradcal-extension
